fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose a Telegraphed Attack to use. At the start of the night, it will be announced which move you used and who was targeted. If not Dodged, you will attack all targets.
- All targets of your Telegraphed Attacks gain the ability to Dodge at night. Dodging cannot be multitasked. When players Dodge, they must choose a player to visit. Depending on who they visit, they can avoid your attack.

fields.name: Telegraphed Attacks:
fields.value:
- Scrape the Earth - Target three players. They must be adjacent to each other on the rolelist. Targets can Dodge this attack by visiting another player being Sword Scraped. However, if two players Dodge and visit the same target, they die instead.
- Execute - Target a player. They can dodge this attack by visiting you.
- Low Circle Sweep - Target two players not adjacent to each other on the rolelist. Targets can Dodge this attack by visiting the player above them on the rolelist.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Dead players do not count when taking rolelist adjacency into account.
- If you perform a Telegraphed Attack and do not kill anyone with it, you cannot use any Telegraphed Attacks the next day as you recover your oversized sword from the ground (since you missed everyone.) Cooldowns still progress while you recover your sword.
- Each Telegraphed Attack has a 1 day cooldown before you can use it again. (So you can't use Scrape the Earth two days in a row.)
- If you are roleblocked, you rampage at your own home and clean everyone.
- **__Part of the Daily Streak faction__**
